name: Triteia's Travels
description:
Join Triteia as she explores the endless depths of the ocean with her girlfriend, a marine biologist named Shelly. 

While exploring Triteia must avoid obstacles like rubble from ruins of an ancient city as well as land mines. However, she can destroy these obstacles with weapons she finds durring her travels. 

Credits:

Sebastian Byer- Coder

Germon Anderson- Music/Art

Cam Wagner- Artist

Parker Ibold- Artist

Paul Frappollo- Designer/Coder
